content: M.L.K.III,said”…We want America to be great for ALL Americans,not any group of people.”,He is absolutely right.Americans!Not illegal immigrants who have broken the U.S. Immigration Laws.Not criminals,drug gangs,rapists,pedophiles,terrorists,no matter what country they come from.Finally we have DOJ that is taking care of biz.The brave men and women of Border Patrol who risk their lives for US.
